title: Culture Profile Template
description: Defines the foundational ideas (values, beliefs, morals) of a culture and its scope. Culture flows from ideas to manifestations: define values/beliefs/morals FIRST, then derive consistent customs. A unified cultural vision prevents contradictory manifestations.

scope.description: Scope level: sovereign power > region > settlement > social group

parent_culture_id.description: If regional/settlement/social, which broader culture does this inherit from

cultural_vision.description: The unifying cultural vision that all manifestations should be consistent with

cultural_vision_detail.description: Detailed description of the cultural vision -- this should make all manifestations feel consistent

core_values.description: Core values of this culture (honor, family, individuality, community, knowledge, strength, etc.)

core_beliefs.description: Core beliefs (religious, superstitious, philosophical) that shape behavior

core_morals.description: Core moral principles (what is considered right/wrong, taboo, honorable)

species_races.description: Species and races that participate in this culture

social_classes.description: Social class structure (elite, upper middle, lower middle, working, poor)

government_influence.description: How the government type affects cultural freedom and variation

inherited_from_parent.description: Cultural elements inherited unchanged from the parent culture

modified_from_parent.description: Cultural elements modified from the parent culture

x-cross-references.sovereign-power-profile: This culture exists within a sovereign power
x-cross-references.cultural-manifestations: Observable manifestations of this culture are detailed in the Cultural Manifestations Sheet
x-cross-references.cultural-clash-planner: Clashes with other cultures are planned in the Cultural Clash Planner
